member.name: P:DataPackChecker.Shared.Data.Namespace.FolderPath
member.summary: Relative to the datapack path. (data/{name})

member.name: P:DataPackChecker.Shared.Data.Namespace.Key
member.summary: Same as Name

member.name: P:DataPackChecker.Shared.Data.Resources.Command.Line
member.summary: The line number of this command. The first line has line number 1.

member.name: P:DataPackChecker.Shared.Data.Resources.Command.Raw
member.summary: The raw command string. The string ends when a new command is started (e.g. after "run" in /execute) and everything else will be inside NextCommand.

member.name: P:DataPackChecker.Shared.Data.Resources.Command.CommandKey
member.summary: The first "word" of the command.

member.name: P:DataPackChecker.Shared.Data.Resources.Command.Arguments
member.summary: All space separated arguments of the command, excluding the CommandKey

member.name: P:DataPackChecker.Shared.Data.Resources.Command.NextCommand
member.summary: Some commands can have another command embedded (like /execute). A second command embedded in this command will be placed in this variable. Note that the next command might also have a next command of its own, you might want to use the Flat property instead.

member.name: P:DataPackChecker.Shared.Data.Resources.Command.Flat
member.summary: Returns this command and all next commands (recursive).

member.name: P:DataPackChecker.Shared.Data.Resources.Function.Commands
member.summary: Returns all commands in this function. Each command might have a NextCommand (e.g. /execute) and that command might have a NextCommand of its own. You might want to use CommandsFlat instead.

member.name: P:DataPackChecker.Shared.Data.Resources.Function.CommandsFlat
member.summary: Returns all commands, including NextCommands (recursive).

member.name: P:DataPackChecker.Shared.Data.Resources.Function.ReferencesFlat
member.summary: Return all uniquely referenced functions (recursive), including this one.

member.name: P:DataPackChecker.Shared.Data.Resources.Function.CommandsFlatWithReferences
member.summary: Return all commands (including NextCommands) of all uniquely referenced functions (recursive), including this one. This is an expensive operation.

member.name: P:DataPackChecker.Shared.Data.Resources.Resource.FilePath
member.summary: The file path relative to the namespace folder.

member.name: P:DataPackChecker.Shared.Data.Resources.Resource.Key
member.summary: Same as Identifier

Output header format:
{type} Tag {ns.Name}:{t.Path}/{t.Name} - {item}

member.summary:
Output header format:
{resource type} {ns.Name}:{r.Path}/{r.Name} - {element}

member.name: M:DataPackChecker.Shared.Output.Error(System.Exception)
member.summary: This method does not provide the creator with enough information, please use a more specific method.

member.name: M:DataPackChecker.Shared.Output.Error(System.String)
member.summary: This method does not provide the creator with enough information, please use a more specific method.

member.name: M:DataPackChecker.Shared.Output.Error(DataPackChecker.Shared.Data.Namespace,DataPackChecker.Shared.Data.Resources.Function,DataPackChecker.Shared.Data.Resources.Command,System.String)
member.summary:
Output header format:
Function {ns.Name}:{f.Path}/{f.Name} - Line {c.Line}: {c.Raw}...
